definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: A pack of gum sells for $2.
sentences.chinese: 該口香糖每包售價2美元。

sentences.english: Buy gum in family-sized 10-packs so you're always prepared.
sentences.chinese: 買十包裝的家庭號口香糖，你就可以有備無患了。

sentences.english: Try sugar-free chewing gum for dessert.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試無糖口香糖的甜品。

sentences.english: Afterwards, one of the monks gave us some gum.
sentences.chinese: 後來，其中一個僧人給了我們一些口香糖。

sentences.english: The chewing of the gum will keep your mouth busy and spare your fingers.
sentences.chinese: 嚼口香糖會讓你的口腔繁忙，也能騰出你的手指頭了。

sentences.english: She was frantically and secretly trying to remove the gum she got stuck in my hair.
sentences.chinese: 暈死，原來她的口香糖粘在我頭髮裏了，她想弄出來。

sentences.english: The other day I saw a disabled man selling chewing gum outside a MRT station.
sentences.chinese: 前幾天，我在捷運站外看到一名殘障男子賣口香糖。

sentences.english: You can also chew sugarle gum or suck on sugarle hard candy to help stimulate saliva production.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以嚼無糖口香糖或含無糖硬糖來促進唾液分泌。

sentences.english: If we don’t have both of these mint products, then we could but mint gums instead.
sentences.chinese: 沒有真薄荷的話也可以用薄荷味的口香糖代替。

sentences.english: Later that month she used her play money to buy a piece of bumble gum.
sentences.chinese: 後來她用私房錢賬戶裏的錢買了一塊口香糖。

sentences.english: He was a guy who chewed gum all the time.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個整天嚼着口香糖的傢伙。

sentences.english: He covertly removed the chewing gum from my hem.
sentences.chinese: 他偷偷地拿掉了粘在我衣襬上的口香糖。

sentences.english: The first product to have a barcode on it was a pack of Wrigley's gum.
sentences.chinese: 第一個印上條形碼的產品是一包青箭口香糖。

sentences.english: Just don't forget the breath mints.
sentences.chinese: 不過喫完了別忘了嚼薄荷口香糖。

sentences.english: The active ingredients are resin, volatile oils, and gum.
sentences.chinese: 活性成分是樹脂，揮發油，以及口香糖。

sentences.english: Sugar-free gum or dried fruit provides a healthy distraction from candy crunching .
sentences.chinese: 無糖口香糖和乾果提供了遠離含糖食物的健康方法。

definition: Mentos, a brand of candy produced by European company Perfetti Van Melle
soft candy (gummi candy, gumdrop, jellybean etc)
